title: Rin!, Volume 02
description: Now that the inter-school tournament is over, Sou and the rest of the third years have retired. Kouichi and Katsura have been nominated as captain and assistant captain of the archery team and their first order of business is the spring training camp. But, with the inconsistencies in Katsura's bow and heart, will the archery club really be okay?
author: Satoru Kannagi
